theorem.title: The Limit Definition of the Derivative
theorem.p: If f(x) is a function, then the derivative of f is defined as f'(x) = \lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}

theorem.title: The Power Rule
theorem.p: If n is any realy number, then \frac{d}{dx}(x^n) = nx^{n-1}
